body_html: @pldelisle , @tscholak , @vade please don't get me wrong. I'd love to have it, and if you search in this thread I joined as a supporter, but as far as I've been following it I reached to the conclusion I wrote, not just because I think it so (I guess a MacBook would melt down if trained with thousands of videos :-D), but with the actual industry facts. Don't wait to have it solved in a short timeframe (IMHO, it won't be solved ever because Apple and Google hate each other since iPhone/Android issue).
